CSRFForm the CSRF check is for
CSRFForm - Enum in de.db.derpate
Enum used to identify a frontend-form, that uses tokens, to protect against Cross-Site-Request-Forgery (CSRF).
CSRFForm() - Constructor for enum de.db.derpate.CSRFForm
 
CSRFPreventionUtil - Class in de.db.derpate.util
This util should be used to prevent cross-site request forgery.

CSRFPreventionUtilTest - Class in de.db.derpate.util
 
CSRFPreventionUtilTest() - Constructor for class de.db.derpate.util.CSRFPreventionUtilTest
 
CSRFServletFilter - Class in de.db.derpate.servlet.filter
This filter can be used to make sure, that a request contains a valid csrf token.
It can only be used by the FilterServlet and cannot be used by the native filter servlet mechanism, as it does not implement Filter.
USAGE: SERVLET/REST only
CSRFServletFilter(CSRFForm) - Constructor for class de.db.derpate.servlet.filter.CSRFServletFilter
Constructor
